info.title: Warehouse Outbound Delivery Order - Read, Update (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:
 - You can retrieve header information for warehouse outbound delivery orders.
 - You can retrieve item information for warehouse outbound delivery orders, including serial numbers.
 - You can change the carrier ID for a warehouse outbound delivery order at header level.
 - You can change the staging bay for a warehouse outbound delivery order, as well as the product quantity, at item level.
 - You can adjust the delivery quantity down to 0 if picking hasn't started, or down to the partial quantity that has already been picked.
 - You can print a loading list for a delivery.
 - You can post goods issue.
 - You can reverse goods issue.
 - You can set the status Ready for Shipping for a delivery.
 - You can reverse the status Ready for Shipping for a delivery.

x-sap-shortText: Integrate external applications with warehouse outbound delivery orders with this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Warehousing - Process Outbound Delivery Order Integration(SAP_COM_0356)
[Standalone Warehousing â€“ Outbound Processing(6VD)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6VD " Link To BP ")
